casebody.data:
BUFFA
v.
CYGNATURE CONSTRUCTION & DEVELOPMENT, INC., et al. 46P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2017 Daniel K. Bryson, Attorney at Law, Madisonville, KY, Matthew E. Lee, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Buffa, Peter, et al.

Patrick M. Wallace, Attorney at Law.

Hannah Styron Symonds, Attorney at Law, Boston, MA, for The Hardwood Company, et al.

Wilson Elser, Attorney at Law.

John I. Malone, Jr., Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Windsor Window Company, et al. Michael P. North, Attorney at Law, Minneapolis, MN, Jeffrey M. Markowitz, Attorney *153and Counselor at law, Minneapolis, MN, for Windsor Windows and Doors (d/b/a). Paul E. Culpepper, Attorney at Law, Hickory, for Cygnature Construction and Development, Inc., et al.

M. Pierce Sandwith, Attorney at Law.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th of March 2017 by Plaintiffs to Amend Petition to Add Additional Authority:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of August 2017."
